game.title: Defeat the Dragon
game.objective: Defeat the dragon and save the kingdom
game.description: There is a menacing dragon terrorizing the kingdom. You have been chosen as the hero who will venture into its lair and slay the beast to save the kingdom from destruction.
game.reward: An enchanted sword and a chest full of gold

task.description: Your first task is to collect a scale from the dragon. This will prove that you have faced the beast and survived.
The ancient artifact is hidden in a secret chamber deep within the dragon's lair. Find it and bring it back to the kingdom.
